consent.description: The application {clientId} is requesting access to your LobeChat account

sessionInvalid.message: The authorization session has expired or is invalid. Please restart the authorization process.
sessionInvalid.title: Invalid Authorization Session

consent.permissionsTitle: The application requests the following permissions:

scope.offline_access: Continue to access your data while you are offline
scope.profile: Access your basic profile information (name, avatar, etc.)
scope.sync:write: Write and update your sync data

consent.title: Authorization Request

failed.subTitle: You have denied the application access to your LobeChat account
failed.title: Authorization Denied

success.subTitle: You have successfully authorized the application to access your LobeChat account. You can close this page now.
success.title: Authorization Successful
